txt.en: 'That incessant chittering never seems to stop. I cannot get any sleep, no matter how many pillows I stack over my head. Please, for my sanity, make them stop.\n\n'The gredbyg are most prolific to the south-west of here. Destroy them! I cannot abide the noise any longer!'
'Praise Durin, they are quieted. Thank you, for tonight I shall sleep in peace.'
'The infernal noise gets so loud you cannot even think.'
The gredbyg outside the Orc-watch camp chitter and screech during the night, keeping the dwarves from sleeping.
The gredbyg can be found to the south-west of the Orc-watch.\n\nKúli has asked you to defeat the gredbyg which are driving him mad with their chittering.

Kúli is alone at a camp far to the south-east of the Orc-watch, in a cavernous corridor between the Redhorn Lodes and the Flaming Deeps.\n\nKúli will be pleased to know the chittering gredbyg have been silenced.
